EmailTemplate.description: Used by Tier 2 Team to send feedback from Detractors (for both install and 1 year check-in)
EmailTemplate.name: NPS: Feedback Email to Dealer
EmailTemplate.subject: Customer Survey Feedback - Name (Lease No./Cash) - Reference No.
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi (Dealer's Company Name),
We received a detractor survey response from (Name of Customer) his (installation experience/experience) with OnForce Solar. When asked if they are likely to recommend your business at a scale of 0 – 10, the homeowner gave a (put the score)
Customer’s verbatim: (put the customer's comments)
Please note that (SunPower has already contacted the customer and he wanted to get this resolved on the dealer’s end or SunPower has addressed his issues). Nonetheless, we would like to provide this feedback to better improve both (Dealer Name) and SunPower’s processes and end-customer services.
Please provide a response and contact the customer to address the concerns that are mentioned above.
Here is a link to the full survey response for your review: (put the "Click Here" with link from the email notification)
Regards,
(Name)
(Fullname) | Supervisor, Customer Service
Global Business and Finance Services |office 800-786-7693 | (email)
